content:
Here are some PRs that could use a review from someone on the lang team. I don't know enough to say whether or not they are correct.

  • https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/808 — Add description for LUB Coercion
  • https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/802 — unsafe fn closure coercion. I think this is more of a pedantic nit, but it seems odd to me to differentiate different function pointer qualifiers. In my mind, "fn pointer" is a general term that encompasses all function pointers.
We're still waiting for reviews on these PRs.
Left a comment on the second, self-assigned the first
